name: Colony Battle Alpha
description:
Hey everybody! So this is a prototype of Colony Battle, a roguelite kinda isometric shooter. You control a mech, packed with miniguns, flamethrowers, rayguns and rockets! In this build, you will see concepts, like controls, bullet types, enemies behaviour, models and more ideas. 

      There is 3 gamemodes, Sandbox, Challenges and Survival. In Sandbox, you can test the controls, the guns, the enemies and give a look on some models and entities we made. In Challenges, you will have 3 challenges to complete, test your ability to survive without guns, make more points before the time runs out or run the gauntlet and reach the finish line. In Survivel, you ll fight 50 waves of enemies, each wave harder than the last one.

     We want this to be a roguelite,  with levels and runs like Binding of Isaac, Dungeon of the Endless, Risk of Rain and etc, but we still dont know how, so any feedback on it will help alot. Actually any feedback on anything in the game will help, tell us if you liked or if you hated.  Thanks alot for checking it! I hope yall like it.

The song used is CP Violation from Half Life 2.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse - Aim
  • Mouse1/Mouse2 - Shoot
  • 1/2/3 - Change Weapon
  • P - Pause

I have a patreon and any money will help alot: https://www.patreon.com/DannyPazzo
